titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning tin, and to restrain the importation thereof from forreign parts.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Published date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Dated at end of text: ... VVestminster, the nineteenth day of February, in the fourteenth yeer of Our reign.
Arms 24; Steele notation: Tin howsoever 2) Tin parts.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Majestie: and
